name: Hillbilly Speedway Challenge - 2016
description:
Hillbilly Speedway Challenge - 2016

Enjoy the real monsters car drive on hills. The easy to start but harder to achieve goals on rough hilly areas, reach your destiny level quickly and write your best score in monster drive history book in each level. Gather
more coins to unlock superb hilly monster vehicles. you will not move forward to next levels until you complete the destiny of first level. You can pick up the power boosters, collect coins, avoid obstacles and bombs.
8991b80348
